summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 54th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8513 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
